LCOM001.name: LCOM_INCREASE
LCOM001.desc: Prohibits an increase in LCOM (degradation of cohesion) beyond the allowed delta.

LCOM002.name: HIGH_LCOM
LCOM002.desc: Limits the maximum absolute LCOM value for a class.

SE001.name: GLOBAL_WRITE
SE001.desc: Prohibits direct writes to global variables.

SE002.name: ARG_MUTATION
SE002.desc: Limits the number of mutated function arguments.
